welcome.title: Welcome to Wurm Manager!
welcome.subtitle: Your complete assistant to manage your Deed in Wurm Online

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Discover what you can do with Wurm Manager

stock.title: Stock Management
stock.description: Complete control of your stock with over 220 item types organized by categories

charts.title: Charts and Analysis
charts.description: Visualize your stock evolution over time with interactive charts

notes.title: Notes System
notes.description: Organize your tasks and important game notes

locations.title: Map Locations
locations.description: Save and organize important locations from the game map

setup.title: Initial Setup
setup.subtitle: To get started, enter your Deed name
setup.deedNameHint: This name will be used to personalize your experience

stock.title: Stock
stock.noItemsFiltered: No items found with applied filters
stock.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
stock.qualityRange: Quality must be a number between 0 and 100
stock.quantityPositive: Quantity must be a positive number

note.title: Title
note.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

location.name: Name
location.urlHint: Paste a map URL to auto-fill fields
location.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this location?
location.invalidCoordinates: Please enter valid coordinates (X and Y must be numbers)

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearDatabaseConfirm:
⚠️ WARNING: This action will delete ALL data from the database!

This includes:
- All stock items
- All history

This action CANNOT be undone!

Are you sure you want to continue?
settings.clearDatabaseConfirm2:
⚠️ FINAL CONFIRMATION ⚠️

You are about to permanently delete ALL data.

Click OK to confirm or Cancel to abort.

logs.instructions: Enter the full path to the Wurm Online logs folder. Example: /Users/Wurm/players/YourName/logs
logs.readError: Error reading log file. Please check if the path is correct and if the Trade.2025-08.txt file exists.
logs.saveError: Error saving logs path. Please check if the path is correct.

updates.title: Updates
updates.noUpdate: You are using the latest version
updates.updateError: Error checking for updates. Check your internet connection.
updates.updateApplyError: Error applying update. Please try again later.
updates.updateSuccess: ✅ Update applied successfully! The application will restart.

calibration.title: Calibrate Wurm Time
calibration.instructions: To calibrate Wurm time, execute the /time command in-game and paste the result below.
calibration.example: [23:00:02] It is 01:49:11 on day of the Wurm in week 1 of the starfall of the Leaf in the year of 1140.
calibration.timeCommandPlaceholder: Paste the /time command result from the game here...
calibration.invalidFormat: Invalid format. Use the format: [HH:mm:ss] It is HH:mm:ss on day of the Wurm in week X of the starfall of the Y in the year of Z.
calibration.error: Error calibrating. Please check the entered data.
calibration.resetConfirm: Do you want to reset the calibration to the default value?

events.title: Events

disabled.title: Events Tab Disabled
disabled.message: To enable this tab, you need to:
disabled.step1: Go to Settings (gear icon in the top right corner)
disabled.step3: Configure the Wurm Online logs path
disabled.tooltip: Enable "Allow Logs Communications" in settings to use this tab

events.logsNotEnabled: Please enable "Allow Logs Communications" in settings first.

trade.title: Trade Chat
trade.disabled: Enable the toggle above to start reading Trade messages in real-time.
trade.noMessages: No messages yet. Waiting for new messages...

events.title: Events Chat
events.disabled: Enable the toggle above to start reading Events messages in real-time.
events.noMessages: No messages yet. Waiting for new messages...

alarm.title: Configure Alarm
alarm.instructions: Configure keywords to receive a sound alert when they appear in Trade messages.
alarm.keywordsLabel: When the message below is sent
alarm.keywordsHint: Separate multiple words with commas. The alarm will be triggered if any of the words appear in the message.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.deleteAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all notifications?
